DOC.brief_summary: The MOBILITY Project is a prospective, non-randomized, observational, multi-centre evaluation of Health Utility via the SF-12速 Health Survey Scores and the SF-6D in patients receiving BOTOX速 for therapeutic use.
DOC.criteria: Patients who are eligible for BOTOX速 treatment deemed medically necessary by their physician Patient (and/or patient's authorized legal representative) should provide written informed consent; a patient under the age of 18 must review and sign the Patient Assent Form Patients at the age of or over 14 Patient is participating in a clinical trial for any BOTOX速 indication Patient with any contraindications to use botulinum toxin A
